definition: flourishing blossom/a mass of flowers/luxuriant flowers
complicated/many/in great numbers/abbr. for 繁體|繁体[fan2 ti3], traditional form of Chinese characters
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: What a surprise of bumper harvest will the flowers bring us after they all are gone?
sentences.chinese: 繁花落盡，我們收穫的又將是一份怎樣的驚喜與豐盈？

sentences.english: The beautiful garden was edged with flowering trees.
sentences.chinese: 那個美麗的花園的邊沿栽種着樹木，樹上繁花盛開。

sentences.english: When the tree with flowers, facing death, not a flower.
sentences.chinese: 當滿樹繁花隨風飄零，面對死亡，沒有一朵花會猶豫。

sentences.english: And off a blossom in mid-air stands still.
sentences.chinese: 忽而靜靜地在半空如一樹繁花。

sentences.english: will break forth in flowers in all my forest groves.
sentences.chinese: 將怒放在我的叢林繁花中。

sentences.english: The so-called flowers but a dream, I was carving time with love.
sentences.chinese: 所謂繁花不過一夢，我曾用愛雕刻時光。

sentences.english: I look to the flowers blooming in the world.
sentences.chinese: 我望向繁花盛開的世界。

sentences.english: For in the springtime flowers come in crowds, and the busy wings of bees jostle each other.
sentences.chinese: 因爲在春天繁花盛開，蜜蜂的忙碌的翅翼也彼此摩擠。

sentences.english: Overhead the chestnut branches were covered with blossom.
sentences.chinese: 栗子樹在我們頭頂撐開綴滿繁花的樹冠。

sentences.english: The torrential rains in the month of April, give rise to the glorious flowers in the month of May.
sentences.chinese: 四月裏的豪雨，會帶來五月裏的繁花似錦。

sentences.english: Then, after the road is in full bloom, or thorns?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，以後地路是繁花盛開，還是荊棘叢生？

sentences.english: The plaza in festival is a carpet of flowers.
Pass by the fervid flowers that press themselves on your sight.
sentences.chinese: 穿過撲來眼底的熱情的繁花，不去管她們的殷勤。

sentences.english: In the Avatamsaka world there are a lot of flowers.
There have been other Mays in other years, but never has there been so much blossom..
sentences.chinese: 沒有一個五月如此這般地繁花盛開。

sentences.english: A sleeve cover, wind, born loud, I and Paris sink.
sentences.chinese: 弄一袖清風，遮住芸生俗豔，我與繁花落地沉冢。

definition: fig. beautiful purples and brilliant reds (idiom); lit. beautiful flowers
thousands of purples and reds (idiom); a blaze of color/fig. a profusion of flourishing trades
red flowers and green willow/all the colors of spring
everything in the garden is lovely
Chunri or Chunjih township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
